Title: Fire in the Hole
Writer: Graham Yost (developed for television by), Graham Yost (teleplay by), Elmore Leonard (based on the short story "Fire in the Hole" by)
Actors: Timothy Olyphant, Nick Searcy, Jacob Pitts, Erica Tazel
Plot: Marshal Givens returns home and is assigned a case involving an old friend from his coal mining days who has become a white supremacist and blew up an African American church.
